title: Mohamed Ali's happy day feast
creator_credit: Nicky Tyndale-Biscoe, Catherine Dyson and Little universe
brief_description: This poignant short feature follows the story of a young Somali refugee couple who start a new life in Melbourne. It traces their initial ups and downs, and their ultimate triumph in establishing a successful cafe, reuniting their family and becoming an integral part of the local community. Nominated for a Best Documentary prize at the 1999 AFI awards.
